text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends At the rate you are going, your failure to lead on the Coronavirus has created the wall that you always wanted— in the form of a travel ban from the EU which creates a “wall” precluding all Americans from traveling to Europe.  Congrats on a job so poorly done.
